extendedInfo.description: Drum Effect Free A drum app like no other. This app lets you create cool Drum beats while combining different trippy backgrounds, effects and colors on each drum hit. This app offers Awesome Visuals and color combinations plus a ton of drums. Fun for all ages. Note: Some of these drums include bass please use headphones for best experienceHeck pets might even enjoy it.Get the full version now for only $1.49 until May 14th.Features - Multi-Touch capabilities- 70+ drum sounds(150 in the full version.)- 6 interchangeable backgrounds (12 in then full version.)- 8 drum hit effects (More to come for the full version.)- Double Bass feature(full version only)- Make your own Custom Drum Kits- Drum Customization auto save- Full version ad free

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Awesome One of the coolest drum apps I have ever played.
reviews.author: A Google User
